availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, farmer. Lawrence County, Kentucky, native. Son of Mary Kinner. Married to Elizabeth Howe Kinner. Father of Mary F. Kinner, Oliver H. Kinner, Mary Elizabeth Kinner, Samantha Kinner, Elizabeth Kinner, James H. Kinner, H.H. Kinner, and Theodore Kinner. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1850. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 215A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 478.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994044, Lawrence County Births.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 24239.
"Greenvill Kinner (1822-1885)," Find A Grave, Memorial 107236927, accessed December 8, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/107236927.
